ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] High Level Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: live tower in lower guk isn t bad experience.  kunark just isn t that great for exp relative to old world because the mobs are generally much tougher than the
ygData.messageBody:
live tower in lower guk isn't bad experience. kunark just isn't that great
for exp relative to old world because the mobs are generally much tougher
than the equivalently levelled mob in the old world.

i'm not sure on the soloing thing, mostly because i don't know how well
twilight works. i know with Song of Twilight i was able to solo karnors mobs
at level 54 by pausing the fight and twisting song of twilight, hymn, nivs and
then restarting. if pixie doesn't work well enough for that, you may just be
stuck with the outdoor mobs in dreadlands.

At 02:14 PM 3/5/01 -0700, you wrote:
>Speaking of which, anyone have good spots for experience at 48-50ish? I
>usually duo with a monk and we have a regen tunic at our disposal.
>However, I also want to be able to solo in the mornings on weekends, etc.
>
>We tried Dreadlands, mobs too low blue to get good xp, hit really hard. Sol
>b was great and would still be good except for the crowded factor and I dont
>think I can solo bats, even if I get a solo pull.
>
>GD is too green, as is EW. Let me know your ideas please :)
>
>Halana, 59th forever shaman
>Tani 48th bardette
>solusek ro
